pkgmetadata.longdescription: # League Shop BaseReusable Django app## Quick startAdd "lsb" to your INSTALLED_APPS setting like this::``` INSTALLED_APPS = [ ... 'lsb', ]```## To specify top sold skin values parser, add the following settings:```LSB_SETTINGS = { 'top_sold_skin_values': { 'func': <dotted_module_string_path>, 'args': <args>, 'kwargs': <kwargs> }}For example:LSB_SETTINGS = { 'top_sold_skin_values': { 'func': 'lsb.utils.skins.get_top_sold_skin_values', 'args': [0, 150], 'kwargs': {} }}```## Changelog (1.0.49)- Renamed is_bare_metal to is_premium in admin- Make rank field non nullable- Added valid account and old stock filter. Needs `old_stock_max_date` in LSB_SETTINGS for old stock filter. ``` LSB_SETTINGS = { ... "old_stock_max_date": "yyyy-mm-dd", ... } ```
